name: ts-for-gir
description: Typescript .d.ts generator from GIR for gjs and node-gtk

scripts.update:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.publish:next: yarn run build && yarn workspaces foreach npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag next --access public
scripts.publish:latest: yarn run build && yarn workspaces foreach npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag latest --access public
scripts.test: yarn build:all && yarn test:girs:all && yarn validate:app && yarn ts-for-gir:cli-examples:all
scripts.test:girs:all: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:all && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gjs: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:vda1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:vda1 && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gtk2: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gtk2 && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gtk3: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gtk3 && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gtk4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gtk4 && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gio: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gio && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:vte4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:vte4 && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:modemmanager1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:modemmanager1 && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:timezonemap1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:timezonemap1 && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:rygelcore2: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:rygelcore2 && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gcalc: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gcalc && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gnomeShell: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gnomeShell && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.build: yarn build:lib && yarn build:generators && yarn build:cli
scripts.build:generators: yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-base run build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-typescript run build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-html-doc run build
scripts.build:all: yarn build && yarn workspaces foreach --exclude @ts-for-gir/cli,@ts-for-gir/lib,@ts-for-gir/generator-base,@ts-for-gir/generator-typescript,@ts-for-gir/generator-html-doc --parallel run build
scripts.clear:build: yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/cli run clear:build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/lib run clear:build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-base run clear:build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-typescript run clear:build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-html-doc run clear:build

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
